column4: I have some .mpeg's of a friends wedding. Is it possible to take these and make something that will play on a stand-alone DVD player? If so, which app(s) should I look into?
some players will play that already...
otherwise you can convert to DVD format
dvdauthor will convert from mpg to dvd
I can give you some command-line if you want (that's all I have)
Can you pastebin the cli stuff?
if you weren't a macgregor, I wouldn't wait this long =)
I"m looking into #flood. Sorry, but I have joined a channel before that auto-Klined me before and don't want to do that again. I'm a cautious person.
besides, that's pretty tame behaviour for a scot, isn't it? :-)
Well, she's changed her mind now. But, thank you for the willingness to help with this.
